languages.text:
Cybermastiff moves to an enemy in a straight line, passing through other units and ignoring AoO on the way, then attacks, applying {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g}.
Can't be used against targets {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g} by other Cybermastiffs. Minimum usage distance is 2 cells.

traits.locale_text:
Cybermastiff moves to an enemy in a straight line, passing through other units and ignoring AoO on the way, then attacks, applying {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g}.
Can't be used against targets {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g} by other Cybermastiffs. Minimum usage distance is 2 cells.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф бежит по прямой к противнику в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Он может пробегать сквозь позиции врагов и союзников и игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Кибермастиф атакует цель, накладывая на нее эффект {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}основная цель{/g}.
Атаку нельзя применить против {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}основных целей{/g} других кибермастифов. Для применения между кибермастифом и целью должно быть не менее 1 клетки.{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its line of sight. It can run through allies and enemies and ignores attacks of opportunity. It attacks the target applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this ability.

The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

Он может пробегать сквозь позиции врагов и союзников и игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Кибермастиф атакует цель, накладывая на нее эффект {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}основная цель{/g}.
Атаку нельзя применить против {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}основных целей{/g} других кибермастифов. Для применения между кибермастифом и целью должно быть не менее 1 клетки.{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}

The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmana doğru düz bir çizgide atılır. Hem düşman hem de dost birimlerin hücrelerinden geçebilir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar. Hedefe saldırarak onda {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedef{/g} etkisi oluşturur.
Diğer siber mastiflerin {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedeflerine{/g} karşı kullanılamaz. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanabilmek için siber mastif ile hedef arasında en az 1 hücre bulunmalıdır.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

Siber mastif, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmana doğru düz bir çizgide atılır. Hem düşman hem de dost birimlerin hücrelerinden geçebilir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar. Hedefe saldırarak onda {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedef{/g} etkisi oluşturur.
Diğer siber mastiflerin {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedeflerine{/g} karşı kullanılamaz. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanabilmek için siber mastif ile hedef arasında en az 1 hücre bulunmalıdır.

languages.text:
El cibermastín se abalanza en línea recta hacia un enemigo que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Puede pasar a través de enemigos y aliados, e ignora {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Ataca al objetivo y le aplica el efecto {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g}.
No puede usarse contra el {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g} de otro cibermastín. Debe haber por lo menos 1 casilla entre el cibermastín y el objetivo para que esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pueda utilizarse.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El cibermastín se abalanza en línea recta hacia un enemigo que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Puede pasar a través de enemigos y aliados, e ignora {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Ataca al objetivo y le aplica el efecto {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g}.
No puede usarse contra el {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g} de otro cibermastín. Debe haber por lo menos 1 casilla entre el cibermastín y el objetivo para que esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pueda utilizarse.

languages.text:
生化獒犬直线冲向{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的单个敌人。此次移动可以穿过敌人与盟友，且不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。随后，生化獒犬攻击目标，同时对其施加{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}效果。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}无法用于其他生化獒犬的{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}，且生化獒犬与目标之间必须至少相距1格才能使用。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化獒犬直线冲向{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的单个敌人。此次移动可以穿过敌人与盟友，且不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。随后，生化獒犬攻击目标，同时对其施加{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}效果。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}无法用于其他生化獒犬的{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}，且生化獒犬与目标之间必须至少相距1格才能使用。

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff fonce en ligne droite sur un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Il peut traverser aussi bien les ennemis que les alliés et ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Il attaque la cible en lui appliquant l'effet {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Cible principale{/g}.
Utilisation impossible contre les {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}cibles principales{/g} d'autres cyber-mastiffs. Il doit y avoir au moins 1 case libre entre le cyber-mastiff et sa cible pour utiliser cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff fonce en ligne droite sur un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Il peut traverser aussi bien les ennemis que les alliés et ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Il attaque la cible en lui appliquant l'effet {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Cible principale{/g}.
Utilisation impossible contre les {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}cibles principales{/g} d'autres cyber-mastiffs. Il doit y avoir au moins 1 case libre entre le cyber-mastiff et sa cible pour utiliser cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフはその{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の内側にいる敵に真っ直ぐ突進する。敵と味方の両方を通り抜けて、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視できる。ターゲットに攻撃し、{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}の効果を適用する。
他のサイバーマスチフの{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}に対しては使用することができない。サイバーマスチフとそのターゲットの間には少なくとも1セルなければこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できない。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフはその{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の内側にいる敵に真っ直ぐ突進する。敵と味方の両方を通り抜けて、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視できる。ターゲットに攻撃し、{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}の効果を適用する。
他のサイバーマスチフの{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}に対しては使用することができない。サイバーマスチフとそのターゲットの間には少なくとも1セルなければこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できない。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich auf direktem Weg auf einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g}. Er kann durch Gegner und Verbündete laufen und ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Er greift das Ziel an und belegt es mit dem {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Primärziel{/g}-Effekt.
Kann nicht gegen die {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Primärziele{/g} anderer Cyber-Mastiffs eingesetzt werden. Es muss mindestens 1 Feld zwischen dem Cyber-Mastiff und dem Ziel sein, um diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} einzusetzen.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff rushes in a straight line to an enemy within its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. It can run through both enemies and allies and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. It attacks the target, applying the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} effect.
Cannot be used against the {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary targets{/g} of other cyber-mastiffs. There must be at least 1 cell between the cyber-mastiff and the target to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
